Class ForwardPopupViewController

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.manager.ForwardPopupViewController
public class ForwardPopupViewController extends Object
Controller class for managing the forward popup view in the manager role. Handles the forwarding of comments to a specific department with optional additional comments.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the UI components.

    • onWeiterleitenButtonClick

      public void onWeiterleitenButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the action of the forward button click. Validates input, confirms the action if no additional comment is provided, and forwards the comments.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the forwarding process.

    • setStage

      public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage popupStage)
      Sets the stage for the popup window.
      Parameters:
      popupStage - The Stage to set.

    • setComments

      public void setComments(ArrayList<Comment> comments)
      Sets the list of comments to be forwarded and displays them in the comment area.
      Parameters:
      comments - The list of comments to set.

    • setClientRequests

      public void setClientRequests(ClientRequests clientRequests)
      Sets the ClientRequests instance for server communication.
      Parameters:
      clientRequests - The ClientRequests instance to set.

    • isSuccessfull

      public boolean isSuccessfull()
      Checks whether the forwarding process was successful.
      Returns:
      True if the forwarding was successful, false otherwise.
